casebody.data:
Donald GIBSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 25, 2017

Kinga A. Kostaniak, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Bruce R. Lockwood, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Donald Gibson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 907, 155 A.3d 330 (2016), is denied.
